_header: In gemescentes pauperes dolenter maken their moan
Subjects: wealth, evils of; sermons, verse in
_description: The evils of wealth — one of two related couplets in a Latin sermon for Trinity 23

CULIi38.Transcription:
In gemescentes pauperes dolenter makyn here moneÞat now
                    no ys in þe world no god but gold alone
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 14.
